name: Sphere Hop
description:
Hi! After about 4 months of starting out in Unity, I took their Roll A Ball tutorial and tried to make it my own with this Sphere Hop.  This is my first ever game and I'm glad to have it out there. Huge thanks to Jelleyyh for making all of the music and sound effects. He's really something.  Hope you enjoy!

I've been documenting my progress over here:  https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC789nohJw8QL8sj4unPZ0gg

And over here! https://twitter.com/SilentWispGames

The first of many!
